programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Reece Shearsmith builds a ladder out of chopsticks, Ania Magliano lassoes a weathervane and Sanjeev Bhaskar tries to crush an egg. Alex Horne gives up his prized watch, Phil Ellis disposition costs him dear and Maisie Adam hits a new low.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Siblings Michael and Catherine are pooling their resources to buy a holiday home in Manilva on Spains Costa del Sol. Jean Johansson shows them what £175k can buy.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Phil and Paula scour Barcelona to bag a beloved bolthole. After viewing a place with the smallest sink in Spain, will they throw the kitchen sink at a place that feels like home?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: This new competition comes from South London where first to host is divorce lawyer Michelle Camacho, who plans a seventies menu including duck a lorange and `psychedelic coleslaw, groovy veg, and a bloody Mary sorbet.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its day two in South London and pub manager and artist Matt Wren struggles with disasters in the kitchen, and while Michelle and Licia spat, Raphael Steele finds himself charmed by Charlotte.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Print manager and live wire Licia Snow is third to host in this new competition in South London. Licia plans a laid back evening with a few rustic and homely touches. But theres small chance of this the way she and Michelle bicker.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Fourth to host in South London is Raphael Steele. Its Raphaels first ever dinner party and he plans some ackee, saltfish, curried goat, and a few other Caribbean favourites based on old family recipes.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Last to host in South London is Swedish businesswoman Charlotte Sundberg, who reckons a night of schnapps, Swedish folk song singing and some classic Swedish cuisine might just win her the prize.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit sees the BandBers glamping again at Phil and Janes Ashbourne Holidays in Derbyshire, where they spot real-life deer wandering about, and visit a local animal park.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Phil heads back to Waterbeach to catch up with Amber and Martin, who were struggling with their three-bed semi. Amber was fed up with the higgledy-piggledy layout, but Martin loved their sizeable home, as it gave him enough space for all his spiders.

programme.title: Great British Train Journeys From Above

programme.title: Location, Location, Location

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Pep and Malene plan to build a modern Viking Hall in the Surrey Hills. Following Peps cancer diagnosis, its a race to create a house that cherishes their memories and life together.

programme.title: The Menu

programme.title: In Old California
programme.desc: Tom Craig is a mild-mannered druggist from Boston who opens a shop in wild and woolly Sacramento shortly before the Gold Rush. The town is `owned by the Dawson brothers, Britt and Joe, who poison Craigs tonic when saloon hostess Lacey Miller takes too much of an interest in the handsome newcomer. Town drunk Whitey has one drink too many, and all of Sacramento is soon in a lynching mood.

programme.desc: All three property renovations today are led by family partnerships - a husband, wife and daughter team in Madeley, brothers-in-law in Castleton and an entire family in Newton Aycliffe get stuck in. All three renovations throw up unexpected issues, but will family harmony remain intact?

programme.title: Trace, Track, Get My Car Back
programme.desc: A family car fitted with a child seat is stolen by heartless thieves. Tracker Richard is hot on their heels but theres a setback when the thieves discover the hidden device.

programme.title: Lost and Found in the Lakes
programme.desc: All around the Lake District, our teams are hard at work as we take on the search for a lost possession thats been treasured for over 30 years. Also, can crafter Sally work her magic on some old ceramics rescued from the lake, and will social media detective Mui find a way to get a mini camera back to its owner?

programme.title: Escape to the Country

programme.title: Policing Paradise
programme.desc: The island paradise of Bermuda is just 21 square miles, and to limit traffic congestion, locals are restricted to having just one car per household. This means motorbikes and scooters are Bermudas most popular mode of transport. The theft of two-wheeled vehicles is a big problem. We follow officer Bryden Pedro and his partner Shandora Burrows on the trail of the bike thieves in a bid to crack down on the five motorbikes being stolen each day.

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: In south London, Nick and the team help five siblings who recently lost their mum. Eldest Somer and Samuel are doing their best, but the family is struggling in a cramped home.

programme.desc: Can nature heal a troubled mind? Alone in the Peaks with only a stick-cam, Alan draws on the teat of Mother Nature and unlocks a heroic side some people doubted he ever had.

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE
programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: History is filled with tales of great minds coming together, and collaborating, to achieve incredible things. It?s also full of idiots working together to create an unholy mess, and people forming partnerships for decidedly sinister reasons, welcome to Horrible Histories? Chaotic Collabs. The Black Hand Gang worked together to assassinate Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, and thus trigger a chain of events that led to World War One.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: The Hit List
programme.desc: Marvin and Rochelle Humes are joined by music-loving friends Oli and Louise from Cardiff, father and daughter Peter and Carol-Ann from Derry and cousins Andrea and Gillian from Northampton, all hoping to show-off their music knowledge and take home the full £10,000 prize pot.

programme.title: Alan Carrs Picture Slam
programme.desc: Comedian Alan Carr hosts as mother-daughter duo Erin and Emma from Falkirk, friends Lil and Nick from Kent, and newly married couple Ryan and Kin from Leicester compete for a chance to win £10,000.

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: RuPaul makes the trip across the pond in search of the queen with the most charisma, uniqueness, nerve and talent in the United Kingdom, setting the contestants a series of challenges week by week.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent in California pursues a gang of bank robbers known as the `Ex-Presidents, who lead him to the LA surfing scene and an adrenaline junkie who lives for thrills. The cop soon finds that he is being seduced by the fast-paced lifestyle of his new mentor.

programme.title: Joe Swash: Forgotten Young Dads
programme.desc: Too often overlooked in research and marginalised in society, many young dads across the UK are quietly rewriting the rulebook on fatherhood. In this revealing documentary, Joe Swash, who became a first-time father in his mid-twenties, meets four young men navigating the challenges of parenting. From stigma and financial strain to isolation and emotional growth, this is the rarely seen lived experience of men in their teens and twenties entering into fatherhood.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson celebrates the 50th birthday of the Jaguar E-type by driving a modern, £500,000 interpretation of this classic sports car before putting on a typically low key birthday party involving live music, classic fighter planes and a group of Royal Marines. Meanwhile, Richard Hammond is in South Africa to test a rugged alternative to the famous Hummer.

programme.title: Zen School of Motoring
programme.desc: Ogmios discusses light-creepers, those scoundrels who creep forwards beyond the white line when the traffic lights are red. As part of his lesson on roundabouts, he takes a trip to Swindon to visit one of the worlds greatest roundabouts.

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Birminghams Hockley Social Club has been transformed into our very own comedy club. Taking to the stage are Eli Hart, Farhan Solo, Chloe Reynolds, Will BF and Monica Hsueh in a bid to impress our judges and book their place in the final. Award-winning comedian and writer Sarah Keyworth is here to keep the house in order. The judges are comedian, writer and podcaster Aurie Styla and local Brum stand-up Lindsey Santoro. Head judge Fatiha El-Ghorri completes the trio.

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: RuPaul makes the trip across the pond in search of the queen with the most charisma, uniqueness, nerve and talent in the United Kingdom, setting the contestants a series of challenges week by week.

programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz, packed with strategy, high stakes and surprises, where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash - anything between zero and a whopping £4,000.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Its a battle of best friends on todays episode. In Derbyshire, two teams scour a bustling antiques centre before their items go under the hammer in Lincolnshire.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Horticulturists offer various techniques to elevate the home gardening experience, from repositioning roses in rustic layouts to planning vibrant spring displays.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: World Championship Artistic Gymnastics LIVE
programme.desc: Coverage of the 2025 World Gymnastics Championships.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Wonders of the Monsoon
programme.desc: In India, huge banks of cloud roll in, heralding four months of incessant rain. The rains trigger a dramatic response. New filming techniques allow us, for the first time to see how mosquitoes survive the impacts of a giant rain drops.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Were at Wolverhampton Art Gallery. Antiques experts James Lewis and Caroline Hawley unearth a sword with a dark history and an early Moorcroft vase, while Paul Martin explores some of the regions industrial past.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Kola Bokinni, Sheli McCoy, John Parrott and Katie Piper test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara dishes up all the backstage gossip and behind-the-scenes action from the world of Strictly Come Dancing, and costume designer Vicky Gill is back with an exclusive look at what the couples are wearing at the weekend.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Zoe Lyons is joined by radio DJ Noreen Khan to hunt for bargains in the antique centres of Shropshire. Help is on hand for these two funny friends in the form of professional antiquers Natasha Raskin Sharp and James Braxton.

programme.title: Highland Cops
programme.desc: Bomb disposal are called in when a chemical lab is found in a flat. police search for missing walkers in Glencoe, and wildlife cops investigate an attack on a bird of prey.

programme.title: The Ridge
programme.desc: Scottish anaesthetist Mia Beaton arrives in New Zealand for sister Cassys wedding, only to find Cassy has died. Mia determines to find her sisters killer among the unusual townsfolk.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: When the crews step onto their lifeboats, they work as a team - and teamwork is key to every rescue. On Irelands south east coast, the three crews at Dunmore East, Kilmore Quay and Rosslare battle together to save a 100-metre-long cargo ship.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined by the latest banished and murdered players as he tells them the identity of the Traitors for the first time! With series 2 Faithful Jaz.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: The Lost Letters of Mary, Queen of Scots
programme.desc: Tracing the extraordinary story of the amateur codebreakers who collaborated across continents to decipher a mysterious cache of coded letters which were discovered to be from Mary, Queen of Scots.

programme.title: Rob Brydons Honky Tonk Road Trip
programme.desc: Rob Brydon continues his musical adventure through the southern states of America, celebrating 100 years of country music. He ventures deep into the Appalachian Mountains - the birthplace of countrys vibrant and diverse roots.

programme.title: How Are You? Its Alan (Partridge)
programme.desc: Hosting Saudi Radio alone in a Norwich business park prompts Alan to ask the question: is solitude healthy, or do we need other people? Can dogs or technology fill the void?

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Rafi was left with brain damage after falling seriously ill. Now he is home after a year in hospital, but his house isnt suitable - the family needs the teams help.

programme.title: Dragons Den
programme.desc: The business idea aiming for investment from the Dragons are reusable tins inspired by India, neurodivergent T-shirts, luxury skincare without the high price tag, and a virtual gifting app.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: The New York Underground!; Hollywood Knights!

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?

programme.title: Scooby-Doo: Best of Shaggy
programme.desc: The gang is run off the road by a shooting star.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are busy playing with a sheep. But when it smells Grizzys biscuits, it takes off. Grizzy is charmed by the woolly animal, and is willing to share his snack. The Lemmings want him back.

programme.title: One Zoo Three

programme.title: The Dengineers
programme.desc: St. Hugh of Lincoln Primary School is in Manchester, many of their pupils have specific needs and would benefit from a space of their own. But the school has no extra space! To solve this they had the clever idea of using an old double decker bus but that was as far as they got. Thats where The Dengineers come in! With our top team and expert designer we are the perfect people to convert the bus and give the deserving pupils their much needed breakout space!

programme.title: Absolute Genius: Monster Builds
programme.desc: Dick and Dom look at the world of monster bridges, tracing the ideas that have taken us from ancient Roman arches to elegant cable-stayed suspension spans, to a future that may see bridges 3D-printed by robots. They join the Royal Engineers for an army bridge-build race.

programme.sub-title: Mardy Mary Queen of Scots Special

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Nicky are sleeping over at Sulas house, but Bing has forgotten Hoppity. The wind causes a branch to make a scratchy noise that terrifies Bing, who isnt very comforted by Sulas fairy rhino. Amma phones Flop, while Sula, Nicky and Bing play Nicky tickles as they wait. Flop arrives, bringing his sleeping bag and Hoppity so they can all sleep over.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Red and Yellow try to make a bright orange colour like their good friend Orange.

programme.desc: Its Duggees Day Off but its not long before the Squirrels show up to tell him about their adventures on their days off, earning their Day Off badges in the process!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Dads accused of fluffing in Blueys face as he climbs out of bed, hes put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo play a game of hairdressers, catering to Mum and all her needs. Then Dad comes along for a haircut, too, and Bluey and Bingo are surprised to discover that he has lice.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: After the others finish constructing the Academy bridge without him, Foz is upset; he doesnt know where he fits into the group and starts to think that he isnt needed any more. He doesnt have Kyans gymnastic skills, Xulis ability as a pilot or Lars mechanical knowledge. But when the new bridge starts developing problems, Foz must rise to the challenge to help prevent a catastrophe.

programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Perilous Party

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: One needs to fix the space satellite to power up a special show.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: When a flying saucer crash lands, F makes a new friend: Fred, who misses his mummy and wants to go home. Can her friends give F the boost she needs to fly Fred to the final frontier?

programme.title: Nick Copes Popcast
programme.desc: The Popcasters help Nick finish a song for the Popcast songbook about a busy beaver called Eva. As they sing, Eva is busy beavering away with a surprise for Nick.

programme.title: Justins House
programme.desc: Justin wants to perform magic so Robert calls in the help of a real magician to make sure Justins tricks are truly magical.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Sula and Amma surprise Bing to show him Sulas sparkly painted butterfly face. Bing also wants a painted face, one that looks like Biteysaurus, and Sula says she can do it for him. Sula begins smothering his face in Biteys signature green, but when she accidentally adds purple spots, Bing is horrified! He wants Sula to go home. But then Flop adds some teeth to Bings Biteysaurus, so he can really be Bitey.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Yakka Dee! celebrates children communicating - because talking fills you up with whizz, pop, bang! In this episode, Dee encourages a friend to say mouse and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different beans and explore how they look and taste. We see red beans, green beans, long, thin and lean beans. We see a friend grow some beans, pick them and then eat them for tea.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Barnaby gets upset when he cant contribute to Lus silly soup.

programme.title: Piggy Builders
programme.desc: Shooting stars are flying over Flat Top Mountain. Everyone in Fine Forest climbs the mountain, except Fiona who has hurt her foot! The Piggies cant leave her behind. Maybe a rocket will do the trick?

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos visit a garden where a deflated inflatable is lying on the grass. The Twirlywoos decide to have a go at pumping up and down whilst the children are inside.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Justin and his friends are on a pirate adventure, searching for buried treasure. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble is struggling to decide which story to read to Tumble Ted.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies have lots of fun playing inside and outside Home Dome. They wave to the Tiddlytubbies from inside and outside. In Tummy Tales, a girl helps her dad take wet washing from inside to hang up outside to dry.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome babies Evie, Gracie, Luke, Joseph, Thea, Benjamin and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Parents, carers and their babies at home are invited to join in with all the fun activities too! Inside everyones bags in this episode are eggboxes which are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding baby appropriate eggboxes inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby!

programme.title: I Spy, You Spy
programme.desc: Elsee plays I Spy during a birthday party with her friends Ethan and Oscar.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: While playing in the garden Maddie and Triggs make a new friend named Reginald, and soon discover that crunchy leaves mean much more to this tiny little caterpillar.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan the train conductor wants to pick up all his passenger friends and take their tickets, but one of his friends is waiting where there are no tracks!

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: The friends are all playing hide and seek. Lou is the seeker, but he falls asleep before he can count to ten.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Minty soars over the valley after being flung onto the back of a baby Bokchoydactyl.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: At school, Bluey and friends throw themselves into various games. Teacher Calypso keeps them on track with a wise word and a song, all except the mysterious Pretzel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels have made a song. They enjoy playing for others but wish they had a chance to see how they perform together. Duggee explains that they can if they make a music video, which tells a story. There is a lot to prepare beforehand, such as lights, costumes and glitter, and as they prepare, we are immersed into Enids dream, where she gives a star performance in her own eclectic music video!

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Catchers arrive on a planet of beautiful quartz and coloured crystals, where they find transparent alien children.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Its Timmys Birthday and his friends make him a delicious cake, but as the party games begin, Timmy cant resist sneaking away to taste a bit of the tempting cake, then a bit more, and a bit more what will Harriet say when she finds the cake is just a pile of crumbs.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.sub-title: Henry Puts on a Puppet Show
programme.desc: Henry plans a puppet show and with the help of little sister Sophie makes a whole host of puppets, including a dinosaur and a princess.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Malika shows us how to make her family recipe for fish ball tagine. Malikas dad is Moroccan and he has taught Malika to cook this tasty dish for her friends. She uses fresh fish poached in a range of spices and flavours including saffron, which makes the food turn a lovely yellow colour. Malika cooks the fish in a traditional Moroccan tagine, which has a cone shaped lid and a round pot. Its perfect for slow cooking fish, vegetables and even meat.

programme.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Henry wants to know all about brilliant beetles. Chantelle is with farm vet Claire, looking for some teeny tiny creatures who love to recycle. Rory and his son Sandy are looking around the garden for little beetles and find a jumpy surprise.

programme.title: Whats on Your Head?
programme.desc: A closer look at scuba diving gear. Mark explains how his scuba diving mask allows him to come face to face with amazing creatures under the sea, like jellyfish, dolphins and even sharks.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Its the start of a new day, and Wren has made a card for her best friend Emmy. Outside, Wren, Emmy and Ayat discover a ladybird, which soon flies away. They go in search of their new fluttery friend, but will they be able to find it? Later, its Solomons turn to sit at the VIP table as he has been doing so well at school, and he chooses Lusungu as his guest. Finally, Sophie has a fun activity for Wren, Solomon and Lusungu. Theyre going on a pretend train trip in search of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Motorbike rider Grace shows off three amazing machines that are all forms of transport. Grace drives a double decker bus, shows off an ice sled that is like a bus on ice, and then takes an electric Hackney carriage for a spin.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `scooter, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different scooters, a purple scooter, a blue scooter and a bopping scooter. Theres a new scooter, a toot your hooter scooter and a family on scooters.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Every time Numberblock Nine hiccups, he falls to pieces, until the others find an unexpected cure. Learn about splitting numbers into smaller numbers with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: A, N and T sit down for a nice picnic, but soon everyone is getting tickled, the food starts disappearing and N gets the blame.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: The Wonderblocks help The Three Bears get ready for some rainy day fun!

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Purple is the host of a fun game show called name that colour, with Pink and Brown playing along as contestants.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun playing games but are surprised to find out that Betty didnt always enjoy playing. Since her first day at Squirrel Club, she has always impressed everyone with her confidence and independence, but because she had grown up playing alone, she didnt know how to join in with the others. Luckily, Duggee had a great idea to bring all the Squirrels together. As a group, they performed the Squirrel Club song about their friends and what theyre good at.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: The builders next door are making so much noise that Yukee and her friends cant hear themselves play their instruments. Instead of trying to drown out all that drilling and banging, what if they played along with it instead?

programme.title: Something Special: Were All Friends
programme.desc: Justin and his friends visit an enchanted castle to make a magic wand and fly on a broomstick. Meanwhile, The Great Tumbleeny performs some magic himself, with varying success.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies go on a very special picnic together. Lots of Tubby Toast pops out of the Dup Dup and lands on the picnic plates for the Teletubbies to munch.

programme.title: Andys Safari Adventures
programme.desc: Andy heads to Dragons Breath Cave, in Africa, to track down a catfish and take its photo.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Waffle discovers he has a talent for painting Mrs Hobbss cat, George, and decides to share his work with her as a way to get in her good books.

programme.title: Molly and Mack
programme.desc: Molly examines her shelf of special things at the back of Macks stall. She chooses the dog collar and remembers the day she got it. Mack buys Daisy a puppy called Little Mo, but Bob warns him that Moira has banned pets from the Hub. When the puppy starts to bark, Molly has an idea. She goes off to the pet stall to buy puppy food, but when she gets back to feed Little Mo, they find she has escaped. They search for Little Mo but they cant find her anywhere.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.sub-title: Raa Raas Big Book of Noises
programme.desc: Topsy sets out to make her own book for story time, but everything goes wrong when Raa Raa decides to join her. Can he put things right in time?

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Game Catchers land on a very wet and fun planet, where they make friends with three snail-like alien local children, who with every loud noise fall back into their shells.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: The Octonauts must stop a huge herd of sea pigs before they march blindly into the Mariana Trench - the deepest point on earth!

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Broken Bed
programme.desc: When Peter breaks the bed his father made for him, he finds that fixing it leads to an unexpected adventure.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is playing with his train set. Choo-choo! Its amazing. The squirrels are curious and want to know all about it. Duggee explains that it is a toy but it works exactly like a real train. Hennie arrives and she has a train too. The squirrels ask if they can play with it. You cant play with it; you can play IN it says Hennie. All aboard!

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: When Kipp doesnt know what made him giddy, its up to Vida to solve the dizzy mystery.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea tells the story of when she and Supertato first met as young veggies.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: When all the vegetables from their garden are stolen, detectives Cosima and Big Lizard investigate all over the neighbourhood - only to return to the scene of the crime!

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Everyone wants to win Swoppitons hide-and-seek tournament. But Mojo and Bo accidentally break the prize. They need to get it back together without the seeker spotting them!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Dads accused of fluffing in Blueys face as he climbs out of bed, hes put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo play a game of hairdressers, catering to Mum and all her needs. Then Dad comes along for a haircut, too, and Bluey and Bingo are surprised to discover that he has lice.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: The Piris hike to Tippety Top to see the southern lights, but must brave some ice fog.

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: Miss Collie challenges the pups to build a raft to carry a dog biscuit across a paddling pool. Woofer and Jazz both have great ideas for building the raft, but Dodge cant choose whose idea is better.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Its the day of Jesss `bring a pet birthday party. Gramps is one of the first to arrive with Muckypups and Thor, two pugs hes dogsitting for the day, and AJ and Anaya have also brought their pets, a gecko called Leo and three fish, Dipper, Dapper and Dopper. Simon and Waffle put on a show for their excited guests, performing the amazing tricks Waffle has mastered. Next to arrive is Mr. Meagre and his talking parrot, Pickles.

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: Isabelle and Oona visit Mossy, only to find him absent. Concerned, Oona enlists Flynnes help. The unlikely trio sets off to search for their missing friend.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.sub-title: Autumn: Its Time to Play Schools
programme.desc: When JoJo and Gran Gran pick up JoJos cousin Lexi from school, JoJo wants to learn everything about what Lexi has been doing there. So, the cousins turn Gran Grans living room into a classroom ready for Lexi to become a teacher.

programme.title: Moon and Me
programme.desc: Moon Baby, Pepi Nana and all the friends find a toy roundabout has been left in the Toy House. Each chooses a vehicle to ride in and they have a race. Mr Onion thinks his very slow Bumparoller will be last, but hes in for a surprise.

programme.title: Clangers
programme.desc: Tiny and her flower friends are playing a lovely tune with the music trees when suddenly they hear a strange voice joining in; it seems to be coming from high in the sky. On investigation, Tiny discovers a lone flower singing as she travels alone through space on a rocky asteroid. Tiny discovers that the flower is lonely and comes up with a clever plan to help her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler in a Box
programme.desc: The friends have a Thanksgiving meal together, Monica is reminded of Richard when she tries to kiss his son, and Joey frees Chandler from the box that hes being kept in to stop Kathy leaving him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Theyre Going to Party!
programme.desc: Monica upsets Phoebe by stopping the catering business before it has started after she gets the head chef job at a restaurant where the staff all hate her, and Rachels boss is killed in a car accident before she can make Rachel a junior buyer.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl From Poughkeepsie
programme.desc: Ross struggles to maintain a long-distance relationship, Chandlers well-intended attempts to get Rachel a date seem to miss the mark, and Monicas plan to assert some authority at her new restaurant goes awry.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes half-brother makes an astounding announcement and a thought-provoking request, while Joey finds himself in a class struggle.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe undergoes an embryo implant procedure to become a surrogate mother for her brother and his wife, and Monica and Rachel wager their apartment in a trivia game against Chandler and Joey.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel schemes to get a handsome client to ask her on a date, while Chandlers jealousy causes problems with his girlfriend. Elsewhere, after losing a bet, Monica and Rachel must swap their apartment with Chandler and Joeys.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys Dirty Day
programme.desc: Charlton Heston finds Joey in a compromising position during a movie shoot. Meanwhile, Rachel regrets asking Ross for a favour, as he ends up spending the weekend in a Vermont cabin with Emily.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Rugby
programme.desc: Ross takes up rugby to impress Emily, and Chandler sets up a ruse to avoid his former girlfriend Janice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Fake Party
programme.desc: Rachel throws a surprise party for Emily so she can invite Joshua; Phoebe develops a craving for meat.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Free Porn
programme.desc: Ross acts on Monicas advice and tells Emily that he loves her just before her departure for London. Unfortunately Emilys immediate response isnt exactly reassuring. Elsewhere, Phoebe receives some rather surprising news about her pregnancy, while Chandler and Joey are glued to their TV for fear of losing the free pornography channel they are suddenly receiving.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels New Dress
programme.desc: Ross has concerns about Emilys interests, and Rachels plans for Joshua are upset by a late change of venue.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Haste
programme.desc: Ross tries to keep Emily from returning to London, and Monica and Rachel attempt to win back their apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Wedding Dresses
programme.desc: Distraught over Rosss engagement, Rachel suggests to Joshua that he marry her, even though theyve only been on four dates. Meanwhile, Monica and Phoebe pick up Emilys wedding dress from a bridal shop, but Monica tries it on and loves it so much she wont take it off. Phoebe also buys one for herself.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel and Ross reminisce separately about when they dated each other, and the friends get invitations to Rosss wedding, but not all of them are going.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Worst Best Man Ever
programme.desc: Chandler and Joey vie for the position of best man for Ross wedding ceremony. Ross chooses Joey after Chandler inadvertently insults Ross, but Joey loses Ross treasured wedding ring. Elsewhere, Phoebe suffers extreme mood swings because of her pregnancy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss Wedding - Part 1
programme.desc: Rachel, Monica, Joey, Chandler and Ross go to London for the wedding where Joey meets Sarah Ferguson, the Duchess of York.

programme.title: 9 to 5
programme.desc: Office satire about three female secretaries who decide to get revenge on their tyrannical, sexist boss by abducting him and running the business themselves. The trio, one of whom has been passed over for promotion because she is a woman, spend a night together having drug-induced fantasies of killing the slave-driving chauvinist. One of them panics the following day when she suspects she really has poisoned the tyrant.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: A topical panel show based on a huge series of opinion polls carried out around Britain. These `Cat Polls are primed to root out the important issues of the day, like what is Britains most unwanted wedding gift or who the British public would most like to have round for dinner. Guests David Hasselhoff, Rachel Riley, Rob Beckett and Justin Moorhouse join the regulars.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Heavy Metal
programme.desc: Rocker and tattoo artist Martyn takes control of his wedding to model and bride-to-be Terri. Martyn fell for his young bride after seeing her modelling underwear on the catwalk. Three years later, Terri is now running Martyns tattoo parlour and his life. When it comes to their wedding, obsessively organised and bossy `princess Terri expects nothing less than the fairytale wedding of her dreams.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon visits Greek restaurant Yannis in Seattle, where he clashes with defiant owner Peter, a chef who is so set in his ways that he hasnt allowed any changes to his menu since the business opened in 1984. His own family are concerned that the restaurant is becoming trapped in the past, but Peter is determined to stick to his guns.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

Her employees say shes like Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde and thats why the local community stay away. Ms Jean insists shes only mean because her employees are lazy, but the business is falling apart.

Ted now has no excuse but to carry out the forfeit.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: An angry rancher resorts to violence when he learns that his wife has fallen in love with another man.

programme.title: San Demetrio, London
programme.desc: Based on a real event, this stirring adaptation of F Tennyson Jesses official account tells how a group of lowly British Merchant Navy sailors saved the San Demetrio oil tanker after it was almost destroyed by the enemy, braving fire and ocean to sail the vessel 900 miles to the safety of a Scottish port.

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: A cowboy falsely accused of murdering his ex-fiancees lover is given a last-minute reprieve by a lynch mob in order to prove his innocence and find the real killer.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: Denny Swift is a Formula One race car driver who understands that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate everyday life. Besides his career, Denny has three loves of his life -- his beautiful wife, their young daughter and his best friend -- a dog who wants to be reincarnated into a human.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: NASA mathematicians Katherine Johnson, Dorothy Vaughan and Mary Jackson cross gender and race lines to help launch astronaut John Glenn into outer space.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: After he and his wife are murdered, marine Ray Garrison is resurrected by a team of scientists. Enhanced with nanotechnology, he becomes a superhuman, biotech killing machine - Bloodshot. As Ray first trains with fellow super-soldiers, he cannot recall anything from his former life. But when his memories flood back and he remembers the man that killed both him and his wife, he breaks out of the facility to get revenge, only to discover that theres more to the conspiracy than he thought.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock is trying to take down Carlton Drake, the notorious and brilliant founder of the Life Foundation. While investigating one of Drakes experiments, Eddies body merges with the alien Venom -- leaving him with superhuman strength and power. Twisted, dark and fueled by rage, Venom tries to control the new and dangerous abilities that Eddie finds so intoxicating.

programme.title: Saint Maud
programme.desc: Maud is a reclusive young nurse whose impressionable demeanour causes her to pursue a pious path of Christian devotion after an obscure trauma. Now charged with the hospice care of Amanda, a retired dancer ravaged by cancer, Mauds fervent faith quickly inspires an obsessive conviction that she must save her wards soul from eternal damnation, whatever the cost.

programme.title: Jamies Comfort Food

programme.title: Tom Kerridges America

programme.title: Tom Kerridges America

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins host the grand final where Holly, Jo and Mary-Anne face their biggest challenge yet - baking for `The Great British Bake Off street party. None of them have baked on this scale before. Amongst their offerings are mille-feuille, mini Victoria sponges, strawberry and cream meringue nests and miniature strawberry and rhubarb cheesecakes. Who of the three will take home the trophy?

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: In the third series, the search for Britains best amateur baker is back as 12 passionate baking fans compete for the title. Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins return as presenters, as do judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood, who devise the three challenges faced by the competitors each week. They incorporate a signature bake, which tests the bakers personality and creative flair; a technical bake, which tests experience; and a showstopper bake, during which the bakers are able to showcase their depth of skill and talent. Berry and Hollywood inspect, prod and sample the baked goodies as they decide who gets to have their cake - and eat it.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: A malevolent force on Argus X claims the lives of two crew members, clouding Kirks judgement. His powers of command come under scrutiny when he seems ever more distracted by a lust for vengeance, at the expense of his crew.

programme.title: Charlies Angels

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Stuntman Colt Seavers tracks and captures bail jumpers on the side.

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: A businessman embarks on a revenge-fuelled vendetta after his daughter dies in a terrorist bombing. His search leads to a cat-and-mouse conflict with a British government official whose past may hold the clues to the identities of the killers.

programme.title: Officer Down
programme.desc: A police officers shady past comes back to haunt him as he investigates a series of assaults against women at a strip club.

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Corrupt cops working in the police department evidence room make plans to rob a vault full of drug money in the back of a convenience store.

programme.title: The Devil Rides Out
programme.desc: Supernatural tale about a nobleman who attempts to save the soul of a close friend who has become involved with a satanic cult. Along the way, his daughter is kidnapped by the cult and offered up for sacrifice to the Angel of Death.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Sheepdog trainer Osian and quantity surveyor Elen meet for the first time as they buy a tired 1940s bungalow together in north Wales. They have six months to renovate and sell it.

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Simon OBrien gives strangers Sam and Eva the cash to buy and renovate a house in Rugby. They have six months to turn it around and get to keep any profit that they make.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to Rigsbys Guest House in Doncaster, South Yorkshire, run by Tracy Ward. The lack of en-suite bathrooms causes a stink, and some guests cannot figure out the pricing.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week is to The Somerset Arms in Semington, Wiltshire, where John Adams is joined by friend Dennis Gowie. But cleanliness issues and thin walls gave cause for concern.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to The Cross Keys Hotel, Saffron Walden, Essex run by former flight attendant Nici Van Valen. The guests love the luxury but a mark on Tracys towel leaves a stain on her stay and tensions are at boiling point.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It is the final day of the competition and the owners are meeting for the last time to find out what they have been paid and to settle some scores. After tension around the table, the payments are revealed and the winner is finally announced.

programme.title: Landmark
programme.desc: Activist artist Favour, light sculptor Jack and figurative artist Alice battle it out in the South of England heat with disciplines ranging from metalwork and computer programming to use of colour.

programme.title: Auction
programme.desc: A collection of 19th-century art goes on sale at Bonhams, while Sothebys prepares to sell a unique musket made for the Chinese Emperor.

programme.title: Auction
programme.desc: Artworks by Gustav Klimt, Amedeo Modigliani, Pablo Picasso and Camille Pissarro are expected to fetch tens of millions of pounds at Sothebys.

programme.title: The Wiz Live!
programme.desc: Dorothy is swept up by a tornado, away from her home in Kansas,and relocated to a fantasy world; on her way to find a wizard who can help her return home, Dorothy meets a tin man, a scarecrow and a cowardly lion.

programme.title: Artist of the Year: Masterclass
programme.desc: Live tutorials from a host of talented artists who have taken part in `Artist of the Year programmes, as they demonstrate easy-to learn techniques for budding artists at home.

programme.title: Artist of the Year: Masterclass
programme.desc: Live tutorials from a host of talented artists who have taken part in `Artist of the Year programmes, as they demonstrate easy-to learn techniques for budding artists at home.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Harrys integrity and hard work have earned him a promotion at the bank. Despite his immaculate accounts, Harry is accused of embezzlement. Is his honesty too good to be true?

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.sub-title: The Last Bottle in the World
programme.desc: Why does Kyros Kassoulas pay a fortune for a bottle of wine and then invite the man he suspects of having an affair with his wife over for dinner?

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: Two kidnappers come upon a tanker in the middle of the desert and decide to make their escape in it. With Burt Reynolds and James Bell.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A man (Robert Horton) schemes with a young woman (Anne Francis) to get rid of his wealthy wife (Vivienne Segal).

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: The story of Academy Award-winning director Spike Lee, who wowed audiences with gripping films like `Malcolm X, `Inside Man and `BlacKkKlansman.

programme.title: Andre Rieu: Welcome to My World

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A cunning woman who attempts to take advantage of a struggling young artist meets her match in his model, Fatima.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A greedy wife has a cunning plan to get rid of her wealthy husband, but he has a few tricks of his own up his sleeve.

programme.desc: ...Road Trip with Frank Skinner and Denise Mina. The pair embark on a new journey, hoping to learn more about literary greats William Wordsworth and Samuel Taylor Coleridge. (1 of 3)

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: A look at the life and career of the Academy Award-winning director, whose work includes `Whos Afraid of Virginia Woolf and `The Graduate.

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: A look at the life of the three-time Academy Award-winner, whose fruitful career includes acclaimed roles in `My Left Foot, Gangs of New York and There Will Be Blood.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Henpecked Arthur decides to get rid of his demanding wife once and for all, so long as he gets her money. Unfortunately for him, his wife has a few secrets of her own.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: The fine line between love and hate is stretched to breaking point when two old school friends share a house.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: An escaped convict (Clu Gulager) visits a spinster (Katherine Squire) and her niece seeking his pen pal.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A woman and her lover (Sarah Marshall, Peter Walker) plot her husbands (Richard Gaines) demise but their plans go awry because of her ineptitude.

programme.title: Johnny Cash: Man In Black In Britain
programme.desc: Documentary exploring Johnny Cashs connection with Britain, featuring testimonies from his own children and friends like Elvis Costello.

programme.desc: Performances from Opry member Lainey Wilson, Carlene Carter, John Carter and Ana Cristina Cash and The Gatlin Brothers.

programme.title: Electric Lady Studios: A Jimi Hendrix Vision
programme.desc: Legendary guitarist Jimi Hendrix converts a New York City nightclub into Electric Lady Studios. It soon becomes home to such celebrated artists as Stevie Wonder, the Rolling Stones, John Lennon, David Bowie and more.

programme.title: Cream: Live at the Royal Albert Hall
programme.desc: The last appearance of the influential rock band Cream was back in 1968. In May 2005, the legendary band reunited to perform a comeback concert at Londons Royal Albert Hall.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.title: Red Right Hand
programme.desc: Cash is trying to live a quiet, honest life in a small Appalachian town. When a vicious crime boss forces him back into her services, he soon learns hes capable of anything to protect his family and his home.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demons bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lords son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage as he fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richards throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! and DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
programme.desc: The Super Hero Girls and the Teen Titans reluctantly band together to fight a new threat to the universe.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: Rock Dog 2: Rock Around the Park
programme.desc: Canine rocker Bodi and his band discover the price of fame when they go on tour with pop sensation Lil Foxy.

programme.title: The LEGO NINJAGO Movie
programme.desc: Master Wu, as wise-cracking as he is wise, leads a fierce team of secret ninja warriors to defeat the evil warlord Garmadon and save Ninjago City.

programme.title: Riverdance
programme.desc: An Irish boy and a Spanish girl journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: Three emojis embark on an epic adventure through a smartphone to save their world from being deleted.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Just as Gru settles into his new role as a suburban family man, the ultrasecret Anti-Villain League sends him on a mission to nab the perpetrator of a spectacular heist.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: Open Season 2
programme.desc: Elliots way to his wedding with Giselle gets longer when Mr Weenie is kidnapped by a group of pampered pets determined to return him to his owners.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: The children and their bickering family are stranded on a desert island. Fortunately help is at hand from the Thornberry family, who are visiting the island to film a rare snow leopard. Once again, animal-understanding Eliza saves the day.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: The brave mariner Sinbad battles raging elements, mutinous dogs and fearsome monsters to retrieve the Book of Peace after being framed by the treacherous Goddess of Chaos. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: Finding Your Feet
programme.desc: A middle-class snob on the eve of retirement takes refuge with her bohemian sister after she discovers her husband is having an affair with her best friend.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a retired widower in his 70s becomes senior intern at a fashion based e-commerce company. Jules Ostin, the founder, while first hesitant, soon learns to respect and even like her new intern despite their age difference.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: Finding Your Feet
programme.desc: A middle-class snob on the eve of retirement takes refuge with her bohemian sister after she discovers her husband is having an affair with her best friend.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a retired widower in his 70s becomes senior intern at a fashion based e-commerce company. Jules Ostin, the founder, while first hesitant, soon learns to respect and even like her new intern despite their age difference.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Housesitter

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: Frederick Manion, an army lieutenant, is arrested for the murder of bartender, Barney Quill. In defence, he claims that the victim had beaten and raped his wife. With such evidence somewhat lacking, Manions lawyer, Paul Biegler attempts to save his defendant from prosecution, setting his assistants in search of witnesses.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, bankruptcy looms over the company that Enzo Ferrari and his wife built 10 years earlier. He decides to roll the dice and wager it all on the iconic Mille Miglia, a treacherous 1,000-mile race across Italy.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Problemista
programme.desc: Alejandro is an aspiring toy designer whos struggling to bring his unusual ideas to life in New York City. As time on his work visa runs out, a job assisting an art world outcast becomes his only hope to stay in the country and realise his dream.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Despite his efforts, Peter cant seem to shake his reputation for mischief among the other rabbits. Once he adventures out of the garden Peter finds himself in a world where mischief is appreciated, but soon his family come to bring him home.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: IF
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyones imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the childrens story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.
